nodes.text: The ST2 concussion missile was a model of concussion missile manufactured by Arakyd Industries. These were the standard missiles used in the Millennium Falcon, which Han Solo modified with a pair of Arakyd ST2 concussion missile tubes that could launch either these or Dymek concussion missiles.

During the Battle of Endor, when Lando Calrissian piloted the Falcon into the second Death Star's reactor, he fired a pair of Arakyd ST2 concussion missiles that helped destroy the Imperial battle station.
